      static void appendDebugInfo(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer, com.itextpdf.text.Document document, com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap settings, StylerFactory stylerFactory)
      This method will append to the pdf a legend explaining the visual feedback in the pdf, an overview of the styles used and an overview of the properties used.
      static void debugAnnotation(com.itextpdf.text.Rectangle rectangle, String styleClass, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer)

      static void debugImage(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfContentByte canvas, com.itextpdf.text.Image img, Color bordercolor, String styleClass, String extraInfo, com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap settings, LayerManager layerAware, VectorPrintDocument document)
      When in debugging mode, adds a border to the image and calls VectorPrintDocument.addHook(com.vectorprint.report.itext.VectorPrintDocument.AddElementHook) to be able to print debugging info and link for the image

        public static void appendDebugInfo(com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter writer,
                   com.itextpdf.text.Document document,
                   com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap settings,
                   StylerFactory stylerFactory)
                            throws com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException,
                                   com.vectorprint.VectorPrintException
